thread.title: The biggest "Boutique" hotel in NYC
thread.title_full: The biggest "Boutique" hotel in NYC - Review of The London NYC, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: DR_MGAV
title: The biggest "Boutique" hotel in NYC
text:
We've stayed several times at The London. Usually one of the pricier establishments, but I've usually reserved at "reasonable" rates during seasonal sales. The rest of Manhattan seems to have caught up as well with their charges.
Friendly staff. Check in easy. Registration staff eager to help. Nice bar and restaurant.
Suite style rooms. Modern style. Comfortable layout. Good showers. Great views if you're higher up. Mundane side of buildings lower down.
Convenient to Broadway, 5th Ave. shopping, and southern Central Park.
Room Tip: Higher floors have nice views. But, you pay for what you see. See more room tips
